duties_responsibilities.duty: Build, test, and integrate assemblies and systems used to produce advanced large scale display manufacturing equipment.
Support hardware R&D initiatives from component to system integration.
Develop and fabricate mechanical and electrical components.
Work with engineers to develop test setup and fixtures, collect data, and generate reports.
Maintain, stock, and organize tools, measurement equipment and hardware lab.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Electro-mechanical Engineering or related field
